bibl.title: On Labyrinths, Lies and Libraries.
Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I
bibl.author: FALIVENE, Maria Rosaria

bibl.note: The reality of the Labyrinth (famously described by HERODOTUS II, 147-148) in the light of archaeology and papyrology.
FALIVENE Maria Rosaria, On Labyrinths, Lies and Libraries.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 309-320, 1 tabl.
